title: The New adventures of the Lone Ranger
brief_description: The New adventures of the Lone Ranger is an animated series celebrating the famous fictitious horse-riding hero of America, the Lone Ranger. Accompanied by his Indian friend Tonto and faithful horse Silver, the three pit themselves against train robbers, blackmailers and saboteurs to ‘always’ save the day in the name of good against evil.
